name: 3 Hour Delivery Service
description:
This Game was made as closely to the 3hr time schedule as we could, not including prep and planning time. I think the concept is fun but it certainly needs some polish and variation to make it playable after 1 or 2 attempts. I'd like to add more variant art, more obstacles, more satisfying visual indicators and improve things like hitboxes.

I learnt about menu design and screen changes as well as how to add and utilise sound to my game.

This was my first Game Jam and the first time I've released a game so a great experience, I'd love to participate in one again, but maybe with a longer timescale!
